list.name: Changes
list.comment:
Initial commit: Flask web app for incident management in control room
- Base structure with Flask and TinyDB - Incident creation with status, priority, operator, type (Incident/Change) - Manual operator assignment - Update functionality with history tracking - Timestamp logging for each change - Automatic calculation of work duration - Simple HTML interface for viewing and editing incidents
